pages.title: Rumor (Bellringer)
pages.text: $(o)The Aether is real?$(br)$(o)Well, we can't be sure, what we can confirm thanks to our knowlede is that its counterpart, the Nether exists,after all, we have learned how to create portals that connect our world with this dimension.

$(o)Lost souls, also known as Wraiths, are transferred from the Overworld to the Nether by a powerful spectral entity known as the Bellringer.$(br2)$(o)if this creature meets a mortal, it will not hesitate to steal its soul.$(br2)$(o)To summon this creature, first you have to craft a Haunted Bell.$(br2)$(o)Finally you have to right click while you are holding the Haunted Bell in your hand.
